titleStmt.title: A nevv poem on the dreadful death of the Earl of Essex who cut his own throat in the Tower. By the Embroyan-fancy of anti-Jack Presbyter.
titleStmt.author: Embroyan-fancy of anti-Jack Presbyter.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Come, with a nimble thrust of Rapier'd wit,".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
